TextView.android:text: In the current era of technology, children have easy access to smartphones and electronic devices from a very early age. While these devices offer great benefits for learning and entertainment, they can also negatively impact a child's concentration and cause distractions. To address this issue, memory games like the 'Card Memory Game' can prove to be a useful solution. By engaging memory and fostering attention to different details, the 'Card Memory Game' can help enhance motivation and concentration abilities for the future. Moreover, it is a fun and engaging way for children to acquire new skills and knowledge. Additionally, the game is designed with user-friendly controls and clear instructions, making it accessible for children of all ages.
